rules.description: Tab â†’ Leader Key (Tab if alone)

to.shell_command:
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to display dialog "[B]rowser commands:

c: Open https://calendar.google.com/" with title "Help" buttons {"OK"}' default button 1

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to display dialog "[O]pen commands:

c: Open -a 'calendar.app'
d: Open ~/Downloads/
f: Open -a 'firefox.app'
g: Open -a 'google chrome.app'
s: Open -a 'spotify.app'
t: Open -a 'ghostty.app'" with title "Help" buttons {"OK"}' default button 1

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to display dialog "[W]indow commands:

y: Previous Display
o: Next Display
k: Top Half
j: Bottom Half
h: Left Half
l: Right Half
close_bracket: Maximize
open_bracket: Almost Maximize
u: Window: Previous Tab
i: Window: Next Tab
n: Window: Next Window
b: Window: Back
m: Window: Forward" with title "Help" buttons {"OK"}' default button 1

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to display dialog "[S]ystem commands:

u: Volume: Up
j: Volume: Down
i: Brightness Increase
k: Brightness Decrease
l: Lock Screen
d: Open raycast://extensions/yakitrak/do-not-disturb/toggle?launchType=background
t: Open raycast://extensions/raycast/system/toggle-system-appearance
c: Open raycast://extensions/raycast/system/open-camera" with title "Help" buttons {"OK"}' default button 1

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to display dialog "Musi[c] commands:

p: Play/Pause
n: Next
b: Previous" with title "Help" buttons {"OK"}' default button 1

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to display dialog "[R]aycast commands:

b: Open raycast://extensions/InteractiveNinja/linkding/search-bookmarks
c: Open raycast://extensions/thomas/color-picker/pick-color
d: Open raycast://extensions/raycast/dictionary/define-word
e: Open raycast://extensions/raycast/emoji-symbols/search-emoji-symbols
p: Open raycast://extensions/raycast/clipboard-history/clipboard-history
q: Open raycast://extensions/gebeto/translate/quick-translate
s: Open raycast://extensions/peduarte/silent-mention/index
t: Open raycast://extensions/raycast/raycast/confetti
l: Open raycast://extensions/raycast/raycast/search-quicklinks" with title "Help" buttons {"OK"}' default button 1

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to display dialog "[N]otes commands:

b: Open obsidian://adv-uri?vault=notes&commandid=quickadd%3Achoice%3A91c007f6-e99e-42b3-be88-b4e197515eec
w: Open obsidian://adv-uri?vault=notes&commandid=calendar%3Aopen-weekly-note" with title "Help" buttons {"OK"}' default button 1

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to display dialog "Sublayers:

b: [B]rowser
o: [O]pen
w: [W]indow
s: [S]ystem
c: Musi[c]
r: [R]aycast
semicolon: Open raycast://extensions/raycast/emoji-symbols/search-emoji-symbols
v: Open raycast://extensions/raycast/clipboard-history/clipboard-history
n: [N]otes" with title "Help" buttons {"OK"}' default button 1
